MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Toolkit.Services.OneDrive.OneDriveStorageFile> CreateFileAsync (string desiredName, object options = null, object content = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1<class Microsoft.Toolkit.Services.OneDrive.OneDriveStorageFile> CreateFileAsync(string desiredName, object options, object content, valuetype System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken) cil managed
abstract member CreateFileAsync : string * obj * obj * System.Threading.CancellationToken -> System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Toolkit.Services.OneDrive.OneDriveStorageFile>

Docs.param: The name of the new file to create in the current folder.
One of the enumeration values that determines how to handle the collision if a file with the specified desiredName already exists in the current folder.
The data's stream to push into the file
Docs.summary: Creates a new file in the current folder. This method also specifies what to do if a file with the same name already exists in the current folder.
Docs.returns: When this method completes, it returns a IOneDriveStorageFile that represents the new file.
Docs.remarks: With OneDrive Consumer, the content could not be null

Docs.param: The name of the new file to create in the current folder.
The data's stream to push into the file
One of the enumeration values that determines how to handle the collision if a file with the specified desiredName already exists in the current folder.
Max chunk size must be a multiple of 320 KiB (ie: 320*1024)
Docs.summary: Creates a new large file in the current folder. Use this method when your file is larger than
Docs.returns: When this method completes, it returns a IOneDriveStorageFile that represents the new file.
